thread.title: A Pleasure
thread.title_full: A Pleasure - Review of Hotel Saint-Jacques, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: GuilhermeThome
title: A Pleasure
text:
A pleasure !
The Saint Jacques hotel makes you feel the pleasure of traveling to Paris. The attention of the staff given to guests is one of the highlights of this hotel. The boss M. Rosseau, always attentive to the details, does not let exist a single fault. Congratulations to the beautiful and comfortable hotel
Room Tip: The rooms are very comfortable See more room tips
